content: I'm looking for some recommendations on portable power banks. I recently attended a music festival and my phone's battery drained quickly. I realized I need something to keep my phone charged on the go. By the way, I just got a new phone case with a built-in screen protector, and I'm really happy with it - especially since my sister dropped my phone a couple of weeks ago and got a small scratch on the screen, but it's not too bad.
